solution_line_template: The amount before the deduction is ${suit_cost} + ${shoes_cost} = $<<{suit_cost}+{shoes_cost}={amount_before_deduction}>>{amount_before_deduction}.
The amount paid to the seller after the discount is ${amount_before_deduction} - ${discount_amount} = $<<{amount_before_deduction}-{discount_amount}={amount_paid}>>{amount_paid}.
